text.name: system_description
text.text:
The APF Microcomputer System is a second generation 8-bit cartridge-based home video game console released in October 1978 by APF Electronics Inc. with six cartridges.
The console is often referred to M-1000 or MP-1000, which are the two model numbers of the console.

El APF Microcomputer System es una consola de videojuegos de 8 bits basada en cartuchos de segunda generación lanzada en 1978 por APF Electronics Inc con seis cartuchos.
La consola a menudo se refiere a M-1000 o MP-1000, que son los dos números de modelo de la consola.
